Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.CrosshairOptionsBuilder

  • Packages that use CrosshairOptionsBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins
    Contains some plugins implementations, available out-of-the box.

    • Uses of CrosshairOptionsBuilder in org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

      Returns new builder instance using the chart global options.

      Sets true if plugin is enabled.

      Sets, for both labels, true if label will be applied in the chart, otherwise false.

      Sets the line dash pattern used when stroking lines, using an array of values which specify alternating lengths of lines and gaps which describe the pattern.
